Package triviaMaze.room

Class IRoom

java.lang.Object
triviaMaze.room.IRoom
Direct Known Subclasses:
LinkedRoom
public abstract class IRoom
extends java.lang.Object
The interface corresponding to a room within the maze
Author:
Jacob Erdman

    • isEnabled

      public abstract boolean isEnabled​(java.lang.String direction)
      Gets whether or not the door in the specified direction is enabled
      Parameters:
      direction - The direction to check, left, right, up, or down
      Returns:
      Returns a boolean representing whether or not the room to that direction is enabled

    • isAnswered

      public abstract boolean isAnswered​(java.lang.String direction)
      Gets whether or not the door in the specified direction is answered
      Parameters:
      direction - The direction to check, left, right, up, or down
      Returns:
      Returns a boolean representing whether or not the room to that direction is answered

    • getRoom

      public abstract IRoom getRoom​(java.lang.String direction)
      Gets the room in the specified direction
      Parameters:
      direction - The direction to get the room of, left, right, up, or down
      Returns:
      Returns a IRoom corresponding to the room in that direction

    • setRoom

      public abstract void setRoom​(java.lang.String direction, IRoom room)
      Sets the room in a particular direction
      Parameters:
      direction - The direction to set the room of, left, right, up, or down
      room - The room to set that direction to

    • answer

      public abstract void answer​(java.lang.String direction)
      Sets a link as answered in the direction specified
      Parameters:
      direction - The direction to answer the room of, left, right, up, or down

    • disable

      public abstract void disable​(java.lang.String direction)
      Sets a link as disabled in the direction specified
      Parameters:
      direction - The direction to disable the room of, left, right, up, or down
